name: (un)finishedproject
description:
game made for wowwie game jam 4 were you colaborate with an ai to make a game.

open the level editor to get started

controls

awds for movment

left click to dash or place block

right click to delete block

use minimum blocks and get all snails to get a prize at the end of the game

i used the will you snail font and tenzbushi made the music
